alert.note: Alert for Boone; Calhoun; Greene; Hamilton; Hancock; Humboldt; Kossuth; Pocahontas; Sac; Webster; Wright (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 6:08PM CDT until July 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Greene County in west central Iowa... Webster County in central Iowa... Southeastern Pocahontas County in northwestern Iowa... East central Sac County in west central Iowa... Wright County in north central Iowa... Southern Kossuth County in north central Iowa... Calhoun County in west central Iowa... Hancock County in north central Iowa... Humboldt County in north central Iowa... Northwestern Boone County in central Iowa... Hamilton County in central Iowa... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 607 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Algona to near Pocahontas to 6 miles north of North Twin Lake to 7 miles east of Sac City, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Dodge, Webster City, Algona, Garner, Clarion, Rockwell City, Dakota City, Humboldt, Eagle Grove, Belmond, Britt, Lake City, Manson, Jewell Junction, Gowrie, Elm Lake, North Twin Lake, Fort Dodge Regional Airport, Big Wall Lake and Eagle Lake. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 136 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Calhoun; Greene; Hamilton; Hancock; Humboldt; Kossuth; Pocahontas; Sac; Webster; Wright
